amendment.description: To expand the eligibility under the State response to the contaminants program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1461 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1461 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1460. (consideration: CR S2321-2322; text: CR S2315) To expand the eligibility under the State response to the contaminants program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1461 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1460.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1461 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
